title: Prescription Passion
description: Dr. Brock Sterling saves lives and finds himself in love quadrangles. Could a coma get in the way of his happiness?
quote: It’s my heart, Doctor. It’s racing.
alt1: Nurse Marie looks hopeful, an x-ray illuminated behind her
alt2: Marie kneels at Dr. Sterling’s side after he collapsed
alt3: Dr. Sterling has his back turned to another nurse
alt4: Dr. Sterling listens to Marie’s heartbeat
